price: Na obi a obedi dwuma pa, na ͻyε gyedieni no, onsuro sε yεbɛsisi no anaasε n’akatua so bεteε.
arabic: وَمَن يَعۡمَلۡ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ وَهُوَ مُؤۡمِنٞ فَلَا يَخَافُ ظُلۡمٗا وَلَا هَضۡمٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: waman yaʿmal mina al-ṣāliḥāti wahuwa mu'minun falā yakhāfu ẓul'man walā haḍman
